author: rstolpe
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

An installer for the Window ARM64 installation.
Many of us running macOS etc. has windows running under 11 ARM64 as VMs. Also ARM64 is the future ;)

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: Wix stable version does not support win-arm64 for creating MSI. We cannot take dependency of beta versions due to compliance reasons.

title: MSI Installer for Windows ARM64
